TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit Int32Rect extends System.ValueType implements class System.IFormattable

Docs.summary: Describes the width, height, and location of an integer rectangle.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` - or ``` ## XAML Values *X* The x-coordinate of the top-left corner of the rectangle. *Y* The y-coordinate of the top-left corner of the rectangle. *Width* The width of the rectangle. *Height* The height of the rectangle. ## XAML Text Usage You can also use white space instead of commas to delimit values. White space can also be used with a comma delimited value set.
